Package de.teamshrug.scooterms

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
de.teamshrug.scooterms.Customer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, ScooterHunter
public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
Customer is allowed to check the account balance and drive a scotter if account balance is sufficient

    • Customer

      public Customer​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)

  • Method Details

    • logIn

      boolean logIn​(java.lang.String password)
      if param password quals the password registered in the customer instance, private attribute loggedin is being set to true
      Parameters:
      password - plain text password
      Returns:
      true for the matching password, false for the wrong one

    • logOut

      void logOut()
      If logged in, the private attribute is set to false

    • getCreditedeuros

      public float getCreditedeuros()

    • setCreditedeuros

      public void setCreditedeuros​(float creditedeuros)

    • getPosition

      public Coordinate getPosition()
      Returns:
      gives back the private positon as Coordinate class

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition​(Coordinate position)
      Parameters:
      position - applies the position parameter to the private attribute position

    • returnNearestScooter

      public Scooter returnNearestScooter()
      Uses Haverine formula for calculating the distance. Distance is not yet used, but is ready to be used
      Returns:
      When logged in, the method returns the scooter, which is geographically closest

    • getIsLoggedIn

      public boolean getIsLoggedIn()
      Returns:
      Returns boolean value, whether the private isloggedin is set true or false

    • useScooter

      public void useScooter​(Scooter _scooter)
      Customer can use the scooter (drive) if his balance is sufficient
      Parameters:
      _scooter - Scooter which is returned by returnNearestScooter
